attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a disabled driver myself, I am finding it hard to afford the running costs of my vehicle's.
I am forced to take a vehicle when I leave my home due to disabilities.
But due to rising fuel costs I am being more & more restricted with my movements.
Last year I had a motorhome adapted for me so I could take my children away on a holiday in some degree of comfort.
But due to the rise in fuel tax's I cannot afford to use it. So I am still stuck as a prisoner at home. Why can we not use red diesel for example.
After all it is available at  most boat yards & plant hire places etc.
Why should the help that we get to become mobile, then become a serous financial restriction of our mobility.
This is a very serous issue that needs addressing urgently.
If you agree with this please sign this petition

rejection.details: The main statement must be a call to action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
